title: Sexcapades:  Willow and the Warlock
description: Magic isn’t all this sexy warlock wields.Willow Wilde would rather live alone than rule a warlock in the tradition of modern witches. After she suffers from a black spell, the Coven leader assigns sexy warlock Evan Ravenwood to protect her and do whatever else Willow demands…in and out of the bedroom. But she isn’t prepared for her sinful guard to sneak into her bed, steal her magic, and flip the tables on everything she thought she wanted.
author: Alexea Leigh
